title: Multiplayer Quiz Trivia Ultimate Game Template Kit
description: Create a Quiz Trivia Game, Multiplayer Ready with Very Few Steps with Multiplayer Quiz Trivia Ultimate Game Template Kit
longDescription:
Multiplayer Quiz Trivia Ultimate Game Template Kit:

Create a Quiz Trivia Game, Multiplayer Ready with Very Few Steps with Multiplayer Quiz Trivia Ultimate Game Template Kit, supporting Single player standalone mode, multiple questions type & categories.


Update 12th Feb 2023 : Questions From API - Check Documentation



 Why This Template?

  • This template is self contained, it doesn't need any external plugins or modules. it contains starting assets to quickly start creating your game, just download, go to the content folder, open the main menu map , start the game and have fun.
  • The Template Show Questions from a datatable which you can edit and add more questions easily, Also support Getting Questions from API.
  • It also contains the starting UI for Quiz / Trivia Game.
  • After you do this just open the documentation found below and start learning how to edit the template and add your own content.
  • Completely Blueprint Code, Every Event Commented and Every Function has Description helping you easily understand the code.
  • Multiplayer is done by the book, with each class doing it's role in the game ( Game Mode / Game State / Player Controller / Player State ) .
  • In-game there is Real time Player Ranking with Final Ranking Result after the match depending on each player number of correct answers.
  • Start creating your own Multiplayer / Single Player Quiz Trivia Game , easily with this template.


Create your game and demo using this template and send it to me and i’ll share your work on my social media channels.
technicalDetails:
Features

  • Game Template
  • Multiplayer Ready / Supports Single player standalone too.
  • Real time Player Ranking with Final Ranking Result after the match.
  • Modular
  • Completely Blueprint Code, Every Event Commented and Every Function has Description
  • Compatible with multiple platforms without using any external plugins for maximum compatibility.
  • Fully documented with step by step to use the template.
  • Support Multiple Question Categories
  • Support Multiple Questions type (Multiple , True or false , etc .. )
  • Ability to show the result of the answer only or show the result & the correct answer.


TECHNICAL INFORMATION:

  • Video : here
  • Main Menu map for example usage ready to use
  • Number of Blueprints: 1 Game ( Mode & State ) , 1 Player ( Controller & State ) , 4 Widgets , 1 Enum , 1 Struct , 1 Datatable.
  • Input: Only Left Click / Touch to select Answer
  • Network Replicated: YES
  • Supported Development Platforms: Check Platforms above
  • Documentation: here

Public domain CC0 content : (Used for presentation of code plugin)
